release.notes:
℗ & © 2013 Third Man Records, LLC
Manufactured by United Record Pressing in Nashville, TN

This 7" features Jack White's solo demos of the songs "I Want to Be the Boy to Warm Your Mother's Heart" and "Little Acorns."
Included with Third Man Records Vault Package #16 along with this [url=http://www.discogs.com/release/4701933]LP[/url] and the 56 page book Pictures from Elephant by David Swanson.
